local_intent: Detect bread, move above it by 2 cm, set yaw to 90 for a lateral push setup, and verify visibility and orientation.
assumptions: Bread is detectable within three attempts
Robot can reach a pose 2 cm above the bread
coherence_with_global: Follows global order: detect bread, then MoveAbove (offset_z=0.02, timeout 800), then set yaw to 90; verifies readiness for subsequent align and push.
